title: respect to which, pursuant to section 100(2)(b) of that Act, a draft has been laid
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Temporary Business
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Temporary Business 

Energy Support Scheme) (Specified Period) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (temporary business energy support scheme) (specified period) order 2023

title: respect to which, pursuant to section 100(2)(b) of that Act, a draft has been laid
heading: 2. The day referred to in the definition of “specified period” in section
text_raw:
2. The day referred to in the definition of “specified period” in section 
101(1) of the Finance Act 2022 as the day on which the period therein referred 
to shall expire shall be 30 April 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 February, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [75] 3
